Also, even though no one asked, I’ve been debating between two meat substitutes, @gardein and @BeyondMeat and the conclusion is this:
#Gardein is great for things where it IS NOT the primary focus of the dish, like chili
#BeyondMeat is great for things where it IS, like casserole
